title: Calculate price of capital at $5 from data

content.description: A firm is currently employing a cost-minimizing combination of labor and capital for a given level of output. The firm is employing 20 workers, and the marginal product of the last worker is 40 units of output. The firm is employing 100 units of capital, and the marginal product of the last unit of capital is 10 units of output.
content.question: If the wage rate is $20 per hour, what is the price of capital?

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
